name: Clean the park
description:
You're a hobo and you decided to help the envirorment by cleaning the local park. Throwing it in the trash can would be a waste of materials, so you should put it in the correct recycling bin

Controls:

  • Movement - W A S D
  • Pick up item - E
  • Drop item - Q
  • Hotbar navigation - Numeral keys or mouse scrolling

Put the garbage into the correct bins. The bin colors are the same as bins in Czech Republic, but what belong where can be also figured out. Good luck
